extendedInfo.description: Download the app to watch Blue Exorcist in English and legally! Now you can watch all episodes on your Android over WiFi & 3G/4G. Check out Crunchyroll app for hundreds of other popular anime shows!What you can watch for FREE:* All Blue Exorcist episodes FREE over WiFi What you can get with a paid membership:* Watch over WiFi and 3G/4G * No ads* 720p HD quality on our website, crunchyroll.com* The anime membership covers premium access to Crunchyroll's anime channel on crunchyroll.com and all apps (Android, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Roku, Boxee, and more) Please rate 5 stars if you like the app~!!Join other Blue Exorcist fans at www.facebook.com/Crunchyroll & www.twitter.com/crunchyrollIf you are having any problems, please let us know here:http://www.crunchyroll.com/forumtopic-634678/android==================== Crunchyroll.com is the largest website for licensed Asian entertainment such as Anime and Korean Drama (K Drama). Proceeds from the subscription service are shared among Crunchyroll's content publishers.

reviews.title: Is amazing~
reviews.comment: I don\'t know how many times I\'ve rewatched this series... I\'d like to thank Crunchyroll for giving me the satisfaction of watching it all le time \343\203\275(\302\264\343\203\274\357\275\200)\343\203\216

reviews.title: Super!
reviews.comment: Galaxy S III. With wireless I get a crisp and clear picture. Also, I have yet to get any ads and it\'s been 10 episodes straight (not a premium member!)
reviews.author: Nicole S.

reviews.title: Will not load video page.
reviews.comment: Will vote 5* when this \'glitch\' is solved! :( I haven\'t seen Au No Exorcist yet...

reviews.title: HEY GOOFBALLS
reviews.comment: This app is great lol most of you don\'t know this so ill exsplain choose an episode and click play it will ask you to become a member decline it, it will then show you a blank black page and then a crunchyroll COMMERCIAL it may come on once or twice, then your amazing show will come on.

reviews.title: Rubbish!
